title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1159/98 of 3 June 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1517/77 fixing the list of the various groups of hop varieties cultivated in the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1159/98 of 3 June 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1517/77 fixing the list of the various groups of hop varieties cultivated in the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 1517/77 is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 June 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 175, 4. 8. 1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 208, 2. 8. 1997, p. 1.
(3) OJ L 169, 7. 7. 1977, p. 13.
(4) OJ L 306, 28. 11. 1996, p. 23.
